sourcesContent:
import { Form, Field, Formik } from "formik"; import CouponsCustomerActionbar from './CouponsCustomerActionbar/CouponsCustomerActionbar' import './coupons-customer.css' import { createRef, useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import AdminService from "../../../../../../services/user-services/AdminService"; export default function CustomerCustomer() { //XXX ref in loop const couponsRef = useRef([]) const things = ['sadefzdf', 'ertcvbxa', 'erzfgf', 'nvioeznrf'] couponsRef.current = things.map((element, i) => couponsRef.current[i] ?? createRef()); const [coupons, setCoupons] = useState([{ id: 0, amount: 0, category: '', description: '', endDate: '', startDate: '', price: 0.00, image: '', title: '' }]) useEffect(() => { AdminService .getCoupons().then( result => { setCoupons(result.data) }, error => { if (error.response) setTimeout(() => { alert("Action Failed\n" + error.response.data.response) }, 0) else setTimeout(() => { alert("Servers are currently down, try again later.") }, 0) }) }, []) const getCoupons = () => { return ( coupons.map((stream, index) => { return ( <> ) }) ) } return (
{({ values }) => (<>
{getCoupons()} {/* < td > */}
Stock Title Description Price Category Release Date Expiration Date
)}
) }
